sentence: The cemetery is scary at night.
sentence_tra: 晚上墓地让人}得慌。

mean_cn: n.可能，可能性；可能的事，希望
sentence: There's a possibility I'm right; then again, I might be wrong.
sentence_tra: 有可能我是对的，当然也有可能我是错的。

sentence: A tornado destroyed my house.
sentence_tra: 龙卷风摧毁了我家。

sentence: On average, men are about 177 cm tall.
The fire will ruin everything in the house.
sentence_tra: 这火会毁坏房子里所有的东西。

sentence: His favorite activity is running on the rotating wheel.
sentence_tra: 他最喜欢的的活动是在滚轮上面跑步。

sentence: My kids are so violent - they'd rather fight than talk about things.
sentence_tra: 我的孩子们暴力倾向很重，她们宁愿打架也不愿意坐下来说清楚。

mean_cn: adj.潮汐的,潮水（似）的，定时涨落的
sentence: The tidal wave of sound was too strong, leaving everyone completely shocked.
sentence_tra: 音浪太强了，我们都震惊了。

sentence: My house was damaged in the flood.
sentence_tra: 我的房子在洪水中被破坏了。

sentence: The bird's feather is very light, and only falls very slowly.
sentence_tra: 鸟的羽毛非常轻，下落得非常慢。

mean_cn: n. 闪电;  意外的好运;  vi. 闪电;  adj. 闪电的, 闪电般的, 迅速的;
sentence: There was a lot of lightning during the storm last night.
sentence_tra: 昨晚风暴来袭时电闪雷鸣。

mean_cn: n. 运输; 运输工具;  vt. 运输; 输送; 使狂喜; 流放;
sentence: The goose is transporting a duck to cross over the river.
sentence_tra: 这只鹅正驮着一只鸭子过河。

sentence: There are many types of humans.
sentence_tra: 这里有各式各样的人。

mean_cn: n. 姿势，位置，职位v. 安置
sentence: He says he thinks better in that position, but I'm not so sure he does.
sentence_tra: 他说他保持那种姿势时能更好地思考，但是我不认为他能。

sentence: The beach is a popular location for tourism.
sentence_tra: 海边是旅游胜地。

sentence: It's easy to be connected with people all over the world  with today's social networking.
sentence_tra: 通过今天的社交关系网，很容易将世界各地的人们联系起来。

sentence: This bus is a bit too crowded.  I think I'll wait for the next one.
sentence_tra: 这辆公交车有点太挤了，我想我会等下一辆。

sentence: My children were all educated in public schools.
sentence_tra: 我的孩子们都在公立学校接受教育。

mean_cn: adj.漂亮的，潇洒的；聪明的；巧妙的，伶俐的v.剧痛，刺疼
sentence: The smart dog can read newspapers.
sentence_tra: 这只聪明的狗能读报纸。

mean_cn: n.同住在一家的人；家务；家常普通的 adj. 家庭的，家内的，一家的
sentence: I perform all my household cleaning on Sunday.
sentence_tra: 我每周日要在家里大扫除。

mean_cn: n. 无家可归者;  adj. 无家的;
sentence: We should help homeless people.
sentence_tra: 我们应该帮助无家可归的人。

sentence: Most doctors earn an excellent income.
sentence_tra: 大多数医生有可观的收入。

mean_cn: n. 目标，球门，终点，(进球)得分
sentence: His only goal was to win the football game.
sentence_tra: 他唯一的目标就是赢得足球比赛。

sentence: When this new development is finished, over a thousand people will live here.
sentence_tra: 新的楼开发完工后，超过一千人会住进去。

sentence: I'm so unfortunate - why does it only rain on me?
sentence_tra: 我真不幸，为什么它只在我头上下雨？

mean_cn: n. 交易;  交换;  交易所;  兑换;  vi. 交换, 替换, 进行易货贸易;  vt. 交换, 互换;  交流;
sentence: This is a good place for us to exchange ideas.
sentence_tra: 这是个不错的地方让我们交换想法。

sentence: The universe is vast.
sentence_tra: 宇宙是巨大的。

sentence: I hope this sandwich is as big as my hunger!
sentence_tra: 我希望这个三明治能正好满足我巨大的饥饿感！

sentence: Every week I measure my waist to see how much weight I've lost.
sentence_tra: 每周我都量一下腰围来看我掉了多少斤肉。

mean_cn: n.索引；指标，标志；指数　v.附以索引，编入索引
sentence: This card index lists all my books.
sentence_tra: 这些索引卡列出了我所有的书目。

sentence: He was the only inhabitant of the island.
sentence_tra: 他是这个岛上唯一的居民。

sentence: He always finishes at the top of his class.
sentence_tra: 他总是得全班第一。

mean_cn: n. 体型；人物；形状；数字v.想出，估计，计算出
sentence: I maintain my figure by eating well and exercising.
sentence_tra: 我通过合理膳食和锻炼保持身材。

sentence: This used to be a nice lake, but now it's all polluted.
sentence_tra: 这曾是个漂亮的湖，但现在完全被污染了。

mean_cn: n. 慈善，慈善团体，施舍
sentence: Rich people should always give charity to the poor.
sentence_tra: 有钱人应该常常捐助穷人。

sentence: She didn't work very hard and finished at the bottom of her class.
sentence_tra: 她没有怎么努力，结果成绩在班上垫了底。

sentence: Many children live in poverty; we should try to help them.
sentence_tra: 许多孩子生活贫苦，我们应该试着帮助他们。

sentence: Japanese life expectancy is the highest in the world.
sentence_tra: 日本人的预期寿命是全世界最高的。

sentence: The similarity in their appearance is striking--I can't tell the difference between them at all!
sentence_tra: 他们的外表惊人的相似―我根本分不清他们两个人。

sentence: Industrial activity is good for the economy, but sometimes bad for the environment.
sentence_tra: 工业活动对经济有益，但有时对环境有害。

mean_cn: n. 位置，定位，外景拍摄地
sentence: I found the location on the map.
sentence_tra: 我在地图上找到了这个位置。

sentence: We go to the movies for some entertainment.
sentence_tra: 我们的娱乐方式是看电影。

sentence: I'm happy when I get on the freeway because I don't have to wait for traffic lights.
sentence_tra: 上高速时我开心极了，因为我再也不用等红灯了。

sentence: These ancient statues are over 2,000 years old.
sentence_tra: 这些古代雕像有2000多年的历史。

mean_cn: n. 记号，符号；标志v. 签署
sentence: Please sign your name on the dotted line.
sentence_tra: 请在虚线上签名。

sentence: These symbols represent all the different things our software can do.
sentence_tra: 这些图标代表了我们的软件能做的所有不同的功能。

mean_cn: prep.越过，在...的那边adv.横过，在对面
sentence: She got across the stream by walking on the rocks.
sentence_tra: 她踩在石头上穿过了小溪。

mean_cn: vi. 进行统治;  居支配地位;  vt. 统治, 管理;  支配;  抑制;  调节;
sentence: This retarded-looking king governs our kingdom.
sentence_tra: 这个智障长相的国王统治着我们国家。

mean_cn: n.(航海)陆标；标志性建筑；里程碑；划时代的事
sentence: The Golden Gate Bridge is San Francisco's most famous landmark.
sentence_tra: 金门大桥是旧金山最出名的地标。

mean_cn: adj. 地理的, 地理学的
sentence: A world map clearly describes the geographical location of all the countries.
sentence_tra: 世界地图清晰的展示出所有国家的地理位置。

mean_cn: n.美术馆，画廊，(议会等的)旁听席，走廊
sentence: This gallery has a lot of flower pictures.
sentence_tra: 这个展览馆有大量的花朵图片。

sentence: I'm not just a pretty face - I have many skills as well.
sentence_tra: 我不光有漂亮脸蛋，也有很多技能。

mean_cn: n.代表，代理人adj.(of)典型的，有代表性的
sentence: The sales representative sold me a car.
sentence_tra: 这个销售代表卖给我一辆车。

mean_cn: n.头；上端；领导人v.率领；前进；出发adj. 头的；主要的；在顶端的
sentence: My head aches - maybe I think too much...
sentence_tra: 头好痛，也许是我用脑太多了。

sentence: The architect imagines the house that his client wants to build.
sentence_tra: 建筑师在想象他的客户想要盖的房子。

sentence: I live in the southwest region of China.
sentence_tra: 我住在中国的西南地区。

sentence: The story says that the birthplace of Jesus was on a farm.
sentence_tra: 这个故事说耶稣的诞生地是一个农场。

sentence: I could go left. On the other hand, I could also go right.
sentence_tra: 我可以走左边，另一方面，我也可以走右边。

sentence: He's known as a big liar.
sentence_tra: 众所周知他是个大骗子。

mean_cn: adj.大陆的，大陆性的n.欧洲人
sentence: Earth was divided into seven continents by continental drift.
sentence_tra: 大陆漂移导致地球分为七个大洲。

mean_cn: n. 下落；行踪；去向；所在之处adv. 在何处；靠近什么地方
sentence: By following the footprints, Dr Watson hoped to discover the criminal's whereabouts.
sentence_tra: 顺着脚印，华生医生希望能发现罪犯的下落。

mean_cn: adj.坐落在…的；处于某种境地的
sentence: The statue of liberty is situated near Ellis Island.
sentence_tra: 自由女神像坐落在埃利斯岛附近。

sentence: This is an old sculpture.
sentence_tra: 这是一个古老的雕像。

sentence: The parliament of our country writes and passes laws.
sentence_tra: 在美国，国会撰写并通过法律。

sentence: When I camp in the mountains, I always wear hiking boots.
sentence_tra: 当我在山上露营时，我总是穿登山鞋。

sentence: You are currently located here.
sentence_tra: 你现在位于这里。

mean_cn: adj.对立的，对面的adv.对立地，反面地n.对立物，反义词
sentence: They face opposite each other because they're so angry.
sentence_tra: 他们背对彼此，因为他们很生气。

mean_cn: n.计划，方案，工程v.伸出，投影，规划
sentence: The construction project is moving quickly.
sentence_tra: 这个建筑工程进展迅速。

sentence: Both of them were happy with their agreement.
sentence_tra: 他们双方都对协议感到满意。

mean_cn: n. 面貌, 相貌;  特征, 特点;  特辑;  vi. 起重要作用, 作为主要角色;  vt. 使突出, 以…为特色;
sentence: Wow, this cell phone has so many cool features!
sentence_tra: 哇，这部手机有好多超酷的特色（功能）！

sentence: Many relics from the ancient Egyptian civilisation have been discovered.
sentence_tra: 很多古埃及文明的遗迹都被发现了。

mean_cn: phr. 自那时起直到现在
sentence: They have lived there ever since they were married.
sentence_tra: 这一对老夫妻从结婚起就住在那里。

mean_cn: phr. 就…而论; 用…字眼; 依据
sentence: Our currency converter expresses yuan in terms of pounds and/or dollars.
sentence_tra: 我们的货币兑换能用英镑和美元来表示人民币的价值。

sentence: I got sick because of the cold and the rain.
sentence_tra: 因为天冷和这场雨，我生病了。

mean_cn: n. 排;  变动范围;  山脉;  放牧场;  vi. 排成一排;  adj. 牧场的;  vt. 排列;
sentence: Try to keep your speed in the 40 to 80 kilometers per hour range.
sentence_tra: 尽量把你的速度保持在每小时40―80公里的范围内。

mean_cn: n. 农产品;  vi. 生产; 产生; 创作;  vt. 生产; 创作; 产生;
sentence: The factory produced things quickly.
sentence_tra: 工厂生产产品速度很快。
